Name: Blue Print
About the game: A game where you can build amazing contraptions using the simple parts given to you. such as: computers using logic gates, build buildings using the parts available to you, and add transportation systems for them! or create precise timing machines that execute the functions that you made them do. features: - simple building blocks that you can rely on to support your buildings. - electrical cables to power components on and off. - basic logic gates to create computers, calculators, etc... - pistons, accelerators, and more blocks to move stuff around more efficiently.
